mapper.select: select u.id , u.name, t.name as officeName from user u left join office t on u.id = t.userid
select id, nickName, city, province, open_id as openId, avatarUrl, create_date as createDate, update_date as updateDate from sys_user where open_id = #{openId}
select password as pwd, open_id as openId from sys_user where login_name = #{account}
